parties: (IN THE DISTRICT COURT) In the matter of a Winding Up Application in terms of sections 255 and 256 of the Companies Act No 17 of 1982 Hatton National Bank Limited, No. 481, T. B. RESPONDENT AND THEN BETWEEN (IN THE DISTRICT COURT) In the matter of an application in terms of sections 260, 261, 348, 350 and 352 of the Companies Act No. 17 of 1982 to stay execution of properties belonging to the Company after the commencement of winding up of the Company.
